review: As far as getting things like Netflix and Pandora, it works great.  However, it has messed up all of the other channels on my TV.  I can only get one and that is the last channel I was watching before I installed the Fire Stick.  I have tried everything I and my son can think of and I only can receive one channel.  I am still looking for a solution to this problem.  If anyone can think of a way to receive my other cable channels, please let me know.
author: Shirley Jensen

review: Easy to set up and easy to use.  I like that I can unplug it and use on another TV.  Would definitely buy again!
author: Paula S. St Julien "pstjulien"

review: So easy to install. The instruction video was great, a no brainer, what could be better. I will be buying more for the rest of my house!
author: Barbara Saulters

review: The device lost the internet connection. The rest of the features works good
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love the Fire TV Stick.  I was'nt able to get Amazon Prime on my Smart TV.  And, now I can as well as other APPS.  The streaming is great never stops playing.  But you know the really best thing I like about it?  When I put it on pause...after a few minutes it begins streaming the most amazing photography of mountains, beautiful wildflower meadows, etc.  It's just beautiful on a 46 inch flat screen.  Sometimes it takes me bit to get back to the show I was watching.  Just love it!
author: Littlebits "happygolucky"

review: Works great with SlingTV!  We also love the Amazon Prime Videos!  Goodbye Cable!
author: K. O'Brien

review: love my fire stick! since I cut my cable cord I have not thought twice about cable since getting the fire stick. Thank You Amazon!
author: Sang H. Lee

review: Awesome product, works as it should.  Easy to connect to TV and is a great price!
author: carol l schmal

review: too far from router.  I guess that's the issue.
author: C

review: Highly recommend !! Excellent. Getting another for upstairs tv. Easy to use
author: nichole graf
